Headline: Correction: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute at State/115th
ShortDescription: SB 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/115th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Correction: Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/115th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Southbound Reroute near State/115th
ShortDescription: Southbound 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/115th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: Southbound #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/115th.

Headline: #63W West 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Harlem
ShortDescription: 63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Harlem and Archer due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harlem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Harlem and Archer due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harlem.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Experiencing Significant Delays Due to Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

Some trains may be either held or rerouted before reaching the bridge (in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route). Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge operation. Allow extra travel time.
